Title: The Lake House
Writer: David Auburn (screenplay), Eun-Jeong Kim (motion picture "Siworae"), Ji-na Yeo (motion picture "Siworae")
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Sandra Bullock, Christopher Plummer, Ebon Moss-Bachrach
Plot: A lonely doctor, who once occupied an unusual lakeside house, begins exchanging love letters with its former resident, a frustrated architect. They must try to unravel the mystery behind their extraordinary romance before it's too late.
